about_the_game:
• "Towers & Goblins: The Last Stand" is a tower defense/RTS game where you must grow your kingdom, handle resources, and defend against goblins.

  • Resist Goblin Waves: Fight off various types of goblins to protect your kingdom from destruction. Goblins attack in waves, giving you time to see their approach and prepare your defenses accordingly. Use this interval to strategize and utilize the geographic advantages of your kingdom to enhance your defense.

    In the demo version, you’ll face 2 missions of escalating difficulty, and an endless mode will be available in future updates. Additionally, a boss fight with "Morgath the Conqueror" will be added at the end of the second mission.

  • Build and Upgrade: The game includes different types of buildings such as infrastructure, defense, and resource gathering.

    In the demo version, you can improve your towers with upgrades specific to their type. A "talents" feature, allowing you to further customize tower abilities, will be added in a future update.

  • Increase and Manage Population: Recruit units like pawns and warriors to help expand and defend your kingdom.

    In the demo version, only these two unit types are available.

  • Gather and Manage Resources: Collect essential resources like wood, stone, and gold. Manage your population and ensure there is enough food to sustain it.
